sys_remote_update_set.description: A system to allow temporary assignment of any CI from multiple depots. After preview and commit, navigate to Loaner Request> Guided Setup to configure the app.

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_1e60a51567301200f5c55bb557415a8d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Loaner Items">7a35b41167301200f5c55bb557415a28</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Check Start/End/Dates</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onSubmit() {
   var jsStartDate = new Date(g_form.getValue('work_start'));
   var jsEndDate   = new Date(g_form.getValue('work_end'));
   var jsToday     = new Date();
   
   if (jsStartDate < jsToday) {
      alert(getMessage('loaner_error_start_before_today'));
	  return false;
   }
   
   if (jsEndDate < jsStartDate) {
      alert(getMessage('loaner_error_end_before_start'));
	  return false;
   }
   return true;   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-01-06 00:41:52</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>1e60a51567301200f5c55bb557415a8d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Check Start/End/Dates</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Loaner Request" source="x_loaner">24e4b01167301200f5c55bb557415a68</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Request">24e4b01167301200f5c55bb557415a68</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_1e60a51567301200f5c55bb557415a8d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin_SHARE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-01-06 00:41:52</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

In the variable that appears, scroll down to the Question Choices related list and update the entries to accurately reflect where your items are available to use. Note, this is different than the depot where it is picked up and may have an impact on how an item is configured before it is deployed. For example, a mobile phone may be picked up in Chicago and used in Singapore.

]]>

sys_update_xml.name: gsw_content_information_5e7f44606732120083f45bb557415a3f
sys_update_xml.payload:
true
Use this list of choices to configure which table(s) in the CMDB are used to identify potential loaner assets. For example, "Laptops" has a value of "cmdb_ci_computer". You may need to extend the CMDB to facilitate asset types that are not provided with a baseline ServiceNow configuration. For example, a new table called u_cmdb_ci_mobile_phone to store loaner phones. Standalone tables are not supported.

As you add/remove/change entries in the sys_choice table, modules in the Loaner Request> Items menu are being updated accordingly. Verify these in the next step of Guided Setup.

]]>

sys_update_xml.name: gsw_content_information_bf6094606732120083f45bb557415a8e
sys_update_xml.payload:
true
Add/remove/update the modules under the Items separator to represent the different types of assets available. These modules facilitate loaner asset management in the Loaner Request> Loaner Items application menu.

Use the following configuration as an example:

Title: Laptops
Application menu: Loaner Request
Order: 2,100
Link Type: List of Records
Table: Computer [cmdb_ci_computer]
Filter: Loaner | is | true

]]>

Set the Loaner field to true on any item you wish to add to the loaner pool. Additionally, use the Depot field to determine where that item may be picked up and returned. These two values combined with the requested start/end time determine which assets are available on loaner requests.

]]>

This creates two properties in the global scope that define the default fields displayed in the activity formatter of the loaner request and loaner tasks tables.

sys_update_xml.name: sysauto_script_0c1dddd167301200f5c55bb557415a72
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><condition/><conditional>false</conditional><name>Loaner Item Return</name><run_as display_value="System Administrator">6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441</run_as><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_period>1970-01-01 01:00:00</run_period><run_start>2016-01-06 00:26:29</run_start><run_time>1970-01-01 07:00:00</run_time><run_type>periodically</run_type><script><![CDATA[// Check the table once an hour to see if there are any items that the user needs to return

var lutil = new LoanerUtils();
var rlist = lutil.getNullReturnReminders();

for (var i=0; i < rlist.length; i++) {
	lutil.sendReturnReminder(rlist[i]);
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-01-06 00:27:15</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>0c1dddd167301200f5c55bb557415a72</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Loaner Item Return</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Loaner Request" source="x_loaner">24e4b01167301200f5c55bb557415a68</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Request">24e4b01167301200f5c55bb557415a68</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_0c1dddd167301200f5c55bb557415a72</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin_SHARE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-01-07 18:23:34</sys_updated_on><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><condition/><conditional>false</conditional><name>Loaner Item Pickup</name><run_as display_value="System Administrator">6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441</run_as><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_period>1970-01-01 01:00:00</run_period><run_start>2016-01-06 00:25:33</run_start><run_time>1970-01-01 08:00:00</run_time><run_type>periodically</run_type><script><![CDATA[// Check the table once an hour to see if there are any items ready for the user to pickup

var lutil = new LoanerUtils();
var plist = [];

plist = lutil.getNullPickupReminders();

for (var i=0; i<plist.length; i++) {
	lutil.sendPickupReminder(plist[i]);
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-01-06 00:26:04</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>56dcddd167301200f5c55bb557415a6e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Loaner Item Pickup</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Loaner Request" source="x_loaner">24e4b01167301200f5c55bb557415a68</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Request">24e4b01167301200f5c55bb557415a68</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_56dcddd167301200f5c55bb557415a6e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin_SHARE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-01-07 18:23:11</sys_updated_on><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><condition/><conditional>false</conditional><name>Loaner Item Overdue</name><run_as display_value="System Administrator">6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441</run_as><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_period>1970-01-01 01:00:00</run_period><run_start>2016-01-06 00:23:57</run_start><run_time>1970-01-01 08:00:00</run_time><run_type>periodically</run_type><script><![CDATA[// Check the table once an hour to see if there are any items that the user needs to return

var lutil = new LoanerUtils();
var oList = lutil.getOverdueRequests();

for (var i=0; i < oList.length; i++) {
	if (lutil.timeToRemindOverdue(oList[i])) {
		lutil.sendOverdueReminder(oList[i]);
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-01-06 00:25:25</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>c77cddd167301200f5c55bb557415ac3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Loaner Item Overdue</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Loaner Request" source="x_loaner">24e4b01167301200f5c55bb557415a68</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Request">24e4b01167301200f5c55bb557415a68</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_c77cddd167301200f5c55bb557415ac3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin_SHARE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-01-07 18:22:53</sys_updated_on><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>true</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_choice</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sys_choice">name=x_loaner_request^element=item_type^EQ<item endquery="false" field="name" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="x_loaner_request"/><item endquery="false" field="element" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="item_type"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Loaner Module Maintenance</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	var ls = new LoanerSetup(current, true);
	
	switch (current.operation()) {
		case 'insert':
			if (ls.moduleExists())
				ls.setModulesActive(true);
			else
				ls.insertModule();
			break;
		case 'update':
			ls.updateModules(previous);
			break;
		case 'delete':
			ls.setModulesActive(false);
			break;
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-08-03 20:19:35</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>37bbc38167012200bb2c5bb557415a99</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Loaner Module Maintenance</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Loaner Request" source="x_loaner">24e4b01167301200f5c55bb557415a68</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Request">24e4b01167301200f5c55bb557415a68</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_37bbc38167012200bb2c5bb557415a99</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin_SHARE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-08-04 20:05:09</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=37bbc38167012200bb2c5bb557415a99"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>global</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Loaner Functions</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[// populate the default value for the caller
function x_loaner_requestGetViewName() {
  if (gs.hasRole("x_loaner.user")) 
     return; 
  if (view.startsWith("ess"))
     return;
  if (view == "sys_ref_list")
     return;

  answer = "ess";
}

function x_loaner_request_listGetViewName() {
  x_loaner_requestGetViewName();
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-01-06 22:54:58</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>4831166567301200f5c55bb557415ab6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Loaner Functions</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Loaner Request" source="x_loaner">24e4b01167301200f5c55bb557415a68</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Request">24e4b01167301200f5c55bb557415a68</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_4831166567301200f5c55bb557415ab6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin_SHARE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-08-01 17:57:15</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=4831166567301200f5c55bb557415ab6"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_6f8511d167301200f5c55bb557415aa4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_loaner_request</collection><condition/><description>A series of conditional checks to trigger events as necessary</description><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Loaner Events</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	// Notify requester if withdrawn
	if (current.state.changesTo(7) && gs.getUserID() != current.requested_for) {
		gs.eventQueue('x_loaner.withdraw', current, current.number, gs.getUserDisplayName());
	}
	
	// Notify assigned_to when comments are made
	if (current.comments.changes() && gs.getUserID() != current.assigned_to) {
		gs.eventQueue('x_loaner.assigned_to.comments', current, current.number, gs.getUserDisplayName());
	}
	
	// Notify assigned to when assigned_to changes
	if (current.assigned_to.changes() && gs.getUserID() != current.assigned_to) {
		gs.eventQueue('x_loaner.assigned_to.change', current, current.number, gs.getUserDisplayName());
	}
	
	// Notify requested_for when comments are made
	if (current.comments.changes() && gs.getUserID() != current.requested_for) {
		gs.eventQueue('x_loaner.requested_for.comments', current, current.number, gs.getUserDisplayName());
	}
	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-01-05 23:55:02</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>6f8511d167301200f5c55bb557415aa4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Loaner Events</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Loaner Request" source="x_loaner">24e4b01167301200f5c55bb557415a68</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Request">24e4b01167301200f5c55bb557415a68</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_6f8511d167301200f5c55bb557415aa4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin_SHARE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-01-07 23:35:09</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=6f8511d167301200f5c55bb557415aa4"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_8810195367321200f5c55bb557415a9c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_loaner_task</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Loaner Task: Set Request Field</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	// Set the request field to the same as the parent
	// Request points to x_loaner_request whereas parent points to task
	// This allows you to place fields from x_loaner_request (e.g. item_type)
	// on the x_loaner_task form if you wish
	current.request = current.parent;
	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-04-20 14:45:02</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>8810195367321200f5c55bb557415a9c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Loaner Task: Set Request Field</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Loaner Request" source="x_loaner">24e4b01167301200f5c55bb557415a68</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Request">24e4b01167301200f5c55bb557415a68</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_8810195367321200f5c55bb557415a9c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin_SHARE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-04-20 14:45:02</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=8810195367321200f5c55bb557415a9c"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_93c651d167301200f5c55bb557415ae0
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_loaner_request</collection><condition>previous.state == 13  && previous.cmdb_ci.nil() && !current.cmdb_ci.nil()</condition><description>Advance the state from Requested to Reserved if the CI went from blank to populated</description><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Loaner State Reserved</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	if (current.state == 13)
		current.state=14;

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-01-05 23:59:50</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>93c651d167301200f5c55bb557415ae0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Loaner State Reserved</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Loaner Request" source="x_loaner">24e4b01167301200f5c55bb557415a68</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Request">24e4b01167301200f5c55bb557415a68</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_93c651d167301200f5c55bb557415ae0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin_SHARE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-01-07 18:15:11</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=93c651d167301200f5c55bb557415ae0"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_a90891d167301200f5c55bb557415a50
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_loaner_request</collection><condition>current.state.changesTo(7)</condition><description>If the parent was canceled, then ensure any child tasks are also canceled</description><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Loaner withdrawn cancel tasks</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var lt = new GlideRecord('loaner_task');
	
	lt.addQuery('parent', current.getValue('sys_id'));
	lt.addActiveQuery();
	lt.query();
	
	while (lt.next()) {
		lt.state = 4; // Closed incomplete
		lt.active = false;
		lt.update();
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-01-06 00:05:45</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>a90891d167301200f5c55bb557415a50</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Loaner withdrawn cancel tasks</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Loaner Request" source="x_loaner">24e4b01167301200f5c55bb557415a68</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Request">24e4b01167301200f5c55bb557415a68</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_a90891d167301200f5c55bb557415a50</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin_SHARE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-01-06 22:20:37</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=a90891d167301200f5c55bb557415a50"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_bae5dd9167301200f5c55bb557415afd
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_loaner_request</collection><condition>current.cmdb_ci.changes() && (gs.getProperty('x_loaner.check_availability') == 'true')</condition><description>Double check to ensure nobody else grabbed the CI while the current user was filling out the form</description><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Loaner Item Availability</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	if (!current.cmdb_ci)
		return;
	
	var lu = new LoanerUtils();
	
	if (!lu.isAvailable(current.cmdb_ci, current.work_start, current.work_end)) {
		gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('loaner_item_not_available'));
		current.cmdb_ci = '';
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-01-05 23:57:07</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>bae5dd9167301200f5c55bb557415afd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Loaner Item Availability</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Loaner Request" source="x_loaner">24e4b01167301200f5c55bb557415a68</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Request">24e4b01167301200f5c55bb557415a68</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_bae5dd9167301200f5c55bb557415afd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin_SHARE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-01-07 18:17:57</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=bae5dd9167301200f5c55bb557415afd"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_loaner_request</collection><condition>!current.work_start.nil() && !current.work_end.nil()</condition><description>Verify the dates are accurate before proceeding.</description><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Loaner Start/End Date verification</name><order>50</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

var start = new GlideDateTime(current.work_start).getNumericValue();
var end = new GlideDateTime(current.work_end).getNumericValue();
	
if (start > end) {
  var msg = gs.getMessage('loaner_error_end_before_start');
  gs.addErrorMessage(msg);
  current.work_start.setError(msg);
  current.setAbortAction(true);
}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-01-06 00:02:17</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c31791d167301200f5c55bb557415a58</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Loaner Start/End Date verification</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Loaner Request" source="x_loaner">24e4b01167301200f5c55bb557415a68</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Request">24e4b01167301200f5c55bb557415a68</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_c31791d167301200f5c55bb557415a58</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin_SHARE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-01-06 22:31:34</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=c31791d167301200f5c55bb557415a58"/></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>true</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_loaner_request</collection><condition>!gs.hasRole('x_loaner.user')</condition><description>Query filter for those without rights to only display their own requests.</description><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Show My Loaner Requests</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	current.addQuery('requested_for', gs.getUserID());
	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-01-06 00:03:27</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>f59791d167301200f5c55bb557415a2a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Show My Loaner Requests</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Loaner Request" source="x_loaner">24e4b01167301200f5c55bb557415a68</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Request">24e4b01167301200f5c55bb557415a68</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_f59791d167301200f5c55bb557415a2a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin_SHARE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-01-06 22:20:16</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=f59791d167301200f5c55bb557415a2a"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_fix_48fa762067221200f5c55bb557415a07
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"><sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><before>false</before><description>Create the initial formatter properties for the loaner request and loaner task forms
Update sys_app_module to allow create/update access for automated module maintenance</description><flush_cache>false</flush_cache><name>Loaner Request Post Install</name><run_once>true</run_once><script><![CDATA[var propList = [
	{
	 'suffix' : null,
	 'name' : 'glide.ui.x_loaner_task_activity.fields',
	 'description' : 'Activity formatter fields for loaner task form',
	 'type' : 'string',
	 'value' : 'assigned_to,state,opened_by,work_notes,comments,*Attachments*'
	},
	{
	 'suffix' : null,
	 'name' : 'glide.ui.x_loaner_request_activity.fields',
	 'description' : 'Activity formatter fields for loaner request form',
	 'type' : 'string',
	 'value' : 'assigned_to,cmdb_ci,state,work_notes,comments,*Attachments*,assignment_group,*Email*,depot,item_type,work_end,work_start'
	 }
];

for (var i = 0; i < propList.length; i++) {
	var p = new GlideRecord('sys_properties');
	p.newRecord();
	p.setsuffix   = propList[i].suffix;
	p.name        = propList[i].name;
	p.description = propList[i].description;
	p.type        = propList[i].type;
	p.value       = propList[i].value;
	p.insert();
}

/*********** UPDATE sys_app_module *************/

var mod = new GlideRecord('sys_db_object');
if (mod.get('name', 'sys_app_module')) {
	mod.create_access = true;
	mod.update_access = true;
	mod.update();
}

/*********** OMIT EDIT AND NEW BUTTON ON APPROVERS **********/
var rl = new GlideRecord('sys_ui_list_control');
rl.newRecord();
rl.name = 'x_loaner_request';
rl.label = 'Approvers';
rl.related_list = 'sysapproval_approver.sysapproval';
rl.omit_edit_button = true;
rl.omit_new_button = true;
rl.insert();
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-03-30 23:11:43</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>48fa762067221200f5c55bb557415a07</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Loaner Request Post Install</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Loaner Request" source="x_loaner">24e4b01167301200f5c55bb557415a68</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Request">24e4b01167301200f5c55bb557415a68</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_48fa762067221200f5c55bb557415a07</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin_SHARE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-08-15 12:35:34</sys_updated_on><unloadable>false</unloadable></sys_script_fix></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_5658305167301200f5c55bb557415a24
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_loaner.LoanerUtils</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Collection of utilities to help manage the loaner request records</description><name>LoanerUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var LoanerUtils = Class.create();

LoanerUtils.prototype = {
	/**********
 	* Initialization stuff here...
 	*
 	**********/
	initialize : function() {
		this.overdueRemindTime = gs.getProperty('x_loaner.overdue.remindtime', 24);
		this.pickupLeadTime    = gs.getProperty('x_loaner.pickup.leadtime', 24) * -1; //paramm to gs.daysAgo()
		this.returnRemindTime  = gs.getProperty('x_loaner.return.remindtime', 24) * -1;
		this.installStatus     = gs.getProperty('x_loaner.install_status');
		this.checkAvailability = gs.getProperty('x_loaner.check_availability') == 'true';
		this.defaultGroup      = gs.getProperty('x_loaner.default.assignment_group', '');
		this.requestTable      = 'x_loaner_request';
		this.taskTable         = 'x_loaner_task';
		this.ciTable           = 'cmdb_ci';
	},
	
	/**********
 	*
 	* getOverdueRequests - retrieve a list of overdue records
 	*
 	* @param - None
 	* @return: array of sys_ids
 	*
 	**********/
	getOverdueRequests : function() {
		
		var a = [];
		var gr = new GlideRecord(this.requestTable);
		var now = new GlideDateTime().getDisplayValue();
		
		gr.addQuery('work_end', '<=', now);
		gr.addQuery('state', 17);
		gr.query();
		
		while (gr.next()) {
			a.push(gr.getValue('sys_id'));
		}
		
		return a;
	},
	
	/**********
 	*
 	* timeToRemindOverdue - Use the passed in ID to check if the record is time to remind again
 	*
 	* @param - id: sys_id of the loaner record to check
 	* @return - boolean: true = time to remind
 	*
 	**********/
	timeToRemindOverdue : function(id) {
		
		var gr = new GlideRecord(this.requestTable);
		
		if (!gr.get(id)) {
			gs.error('LoanerUtils: timeToRemindOverdue(): FAILED TO RETRIEVE RECORD');
			return false;
		}
		var baseDate = (gr.last_overdue_reminder == '') ? gr.work_end : gr.last_overdue_reminder;
				
		return (baseDate <= gs.hoursAgo(this.overdueRemindTime)) ? true : false;
	},
	
	/**********
 	*
 	* sendOverdueReminder - Queue an event to send a reminder and update the necessary
 	*                       record fields to indicate they've been reminded
 	*
 	* @param - id: sys_id of the loaner record to check
 	* @return - None
 	*
 	**********/
	sendOverdueReminder : function(id) {
		
		var gr = new GlideRecord(this.requestTable);
		var now = new GlideDateTime().getDisplayValue();
		
		if (!gr.get(id)) {
			gs.error('LoanerUtils: setLastOverdueReminder(): FAILED TO RETRIEVE RECORD');
			return;
		}
		++gr.overdue_count;
		
		// Record the last time a reminder was sent
		gr.last_overdue_reminder.setDisplayValue(now);
		gr.update();
		
		// Send the overdue reminder
		gs.eventQueue('x_loaner.overdue', gr, gr.work_start, gr.work_end);
	},
	
	/**********
 	*
 	* getNullPickupReminders - Get a list of records in state 'Ready for Pickup'
 	*                          that haven't been reminded before
 	*
 	* @param - None
 	* @return - array of sys_ids
 	*
 	**********/
	getNullPickupReminders : function() {
		
		var a = [];
		var gr = new GlideRecord(this.requestTable);
		
		gr.addQuery('state', 16);
		gr.addQuery('pickup_reminder', '');
		gr.addQuery('work_start', '<=', gs.hoursAgo(this.pickupLeadTime));
		gr.query();
		
		while (gr.next()) {
			a.push(gr.getValue('sys_id'));
		}
		return a;
	},
	
	/**********
 	*
 	* sendPickupReminder - Queue an event to send a reminder and update the pickup reminder field
 	*
 	* @param - id: sys_id of the loaner record to check
 	* @return - None
 	*
 	**********/
	sendPickupReminder : function(id) {
		
		var gr = new GlideRecord(this.requestTable);
		var now = new GlideDateTime().getDisplayValue();
		
		if (!gr.get(id)) {
			gs.error('LoanerUtils: sendPickupReminder(): FAILED TO RETRIEVE RECORD');
			return;
		}
		
		// Log the time the pickup reminder was sent and avoid sending again
		gr.pickup_reminder.setDisplayValue(now);
		gr.update();
		
		// Send the pickup reminder
		gs.eventQueue('x_loaner.pickup', gr, gr.work_start, gr.work_end);
		return;
	},
	
	/**********
 	*
 	* getNullReturnReminders - Get a list of records that need reminding to bring their item back
 	*
 	* @param - None
 	* @return - array of sys_ids
 	*
 	**********/
	getNullReturnReminders : function() {
		
		var a =[];
		var gr = new GlideRecord(this.requestTable);
		
		gr.addQuery('state', 17);
		gr.addQuery('return_reminder', '');
		gr.addQuery('work_end', '<=', gs.hoursAgo(this.returnRemindTime));
		gr.query();
		
		while (gr.next()) {
			a.push(gr.getValue('sys_id'));
		}
		return a;
	},
	
	/**********
 	*
 	* setReturnReminder - Queue a return reminder and update field when reminder was sent
 	*
 	* @param - id: sys_id of the loaner record to check
 	* @return - None
 	*
 	**********/
	sendReturnReminder : function(id) {
		
		var gr = new GlideRecord(this.requestTable);
		var now = new GlideDateTime().getDisplayValue();
		
		if (!gr.get(id)) {
			gs.error('LoanerUtils: sendReturnReminder(): FAILED TO RETRIEVE RECORD');
			return;
		}
		
		// Set this record to never remind again
		gr.return_reminder.setDisplayValue(now);
		gr.update();
		
		// Send the return reminder
		gs.eventQueue('x_loaner.return', gr, gr.work_start, gr.work_end);
	},
	
	/*********
 	*
 	* withdrawRequest - Update a request and all related bits
 	*                   (child tasks are handled by a standard bus. rule)
 	*
 	* @param lr - GlideRecord of the request
 	* @return None
 	*
 	**********/
	withdrawRequest : function(lr) {
		
		var wf = new global.Workflow();
		
		wf.cancel(lr);
		lr.active = false;
		lr.state  = 7;
		lr.update();
		
		gs.addInfoMessage(gs.getMessage('loaner_withdraw'));
	},
	
	/*********
 	*
 	* isAvailable - check to see if there are no conflicts w/ci
 	*               being available between start and end times
 	*               and CI is "in" (loaner request state=Requested, Closed, Withdrawn)
 	*
 	* @param ci - GlideRecord or sys_id of the CI being requested
 	* @param start - start date-time of the requested reservation
 	* @param end - end date-time of the requested reservation
 	* @return boolean - true=no conflicts
 	*
 	**********/
	isAvailable : function(ci, start, end) {
		
		var ci_id = ci;
		var count = 0;
		var lr    = new GlideAggregate(this.requestTable);
		
		// Null CI defaults to "not available"
		if (!ci)
			return false;
		
		if (ci instanceof GlideRecord)
			ci_id = ci.sys_id;
		
		var myQuery = 'active=true^';
		myQuery += 'cmdb_ci=' + ci + '^';
		myQuery += 'work_start<' + end + '^';
		myQuery += 'work_end>' + start + '^';
		myQuery += 'NQ';
		myQuery += 'active=true^';
		myQuery += 'cmdb_ci=' + ci + '^';
		myQuery += 'work_end<' + gs.daysAgo(0);
		
		lr.addAggregate('COUNT');
		lr.addQuery(myQuery);
		lr.query();
		
		if (lr.next()) {
			count = lr.getAggregate('COUNT');
		}
		
		return (count == 0);
	},
	
	/**********
 	*
 	* availableCis - get a list of CIs in a class/depot that are available
 	*
 	* @param class_name - CI class
 	* @param depot_name - Name of the pick up location
 	* @param start - reservation start date
 	* @param end - reservation end date
 	* @return - comma separated list of sys_ids that are available at that time
 	*
 	**********/
	availableCis : function(class_name, depot_name, start, end) {
		
		var ci                    = new GlideRecord(this.ciTable);
		var availableItems        = [];
		
		if (this.installStatus) {
			ci.addQuery('install_status', 'IN', this.installStatus);
		}
		ci.addQuery('x_loaner_isloaner', true);
		ci.addQuery('sys_class_name', class_name);
		ci.addQuery('x_loaner_depot', depot_name);
		ci.query();
		
		while (ci.next()) {
			var id = ci.getValue('sys_id');
			
			// Check only available matching items
			if (this.checkAvailability) {
				if (this.isAvailable(id, start, end))
					availableItems.push(id);
				
			} else {
				// Take any matching items
				availableItems.push(id);
			}
		}
		
		return availableItems.join(',');
	},
	
	/**********
 	*
 	* getDefaultAssignmentGroup - get the Assignment Group
	*                    Used by the dictionary override for task.assignment_group
 	*
	* @param - none
	* @return - sys_id
	*
	***********/
	getDefaultAssignmentGroup : function() {
		
		if (this.defaultGroup == '')
			return;
		
		var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user_group');
		
		if (!gr.get('name', this.defaultGroup))
			return;
		
		return gr.getValue('sys_id');
	},

	
	type: 'LoanerUtils'
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-01-05 21:46:52</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>5658305167301200f5c55bb557415a24</sys_id><sys_mod_count>21</sys_mod_count><sys_name>LoanerUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Loaner Request" source="x_loaner">24e4b01167301200f5c55bb557415a68</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Request">24e4b01167301200f5c55bb557415a68</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5658305167301200f5c55bb557415a24</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin_SHARE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-01-07 22:57:12</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_7578d1d167301200f5c55bb557415a24
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_loaner.loanerCIRefQual</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Advanced reference qualifier for the loaner request system</description><name>loanerCIRefQual</name><script><![CDATA[/*   This is an advanced qualifier function for the cmdb_ci field
 *   To use it, add the following line to the CI ref qualifier
 *	javascript:loanerCIRefQual()
 */

function loanerCIRefQual() {
	
	var answer;
	var lu = new x_loaner.LoanerUtils();
	var depot = current.getValue('depot');
	var item_type = current.item_type;
	
	answer = 'sys_idIN' + lu.availableCis(item_type, depot, current.work_start, current.work_end);
	
	return answer;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-01-06 00:08:46</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>7578d1d167301200f5c55bb557415a24</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>loanerCIRefQual</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Loaner Request" source="x_loaner">24e4b01167301200f5c55bb557415a68</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Request">24e4b01167301200f5c55bb557415a68</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_7578d1d167301200f5c55bb557415a24</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin_SHARE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-01-07 11:43:28</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_e9ec2f0567012200bb2c5bb557415a0a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_loaner.LoanerSetup</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Functions used to help create and maintain modules based on the item type choice list</description><name>LoanerSetup</name><script><![CDATA[var LoanerSetup = Class.create();
LoanerSetup.prototype = {
	initialize: function(choiceRec, displayOutput) {
		this.appID         = 'f8e4341167301200f5c55bb557415a78';
		this.choiceRec     = choiceRec;
		this.modName       = choiceRec.getValue('label');
		this.modTable      = choiceRec.getValue('value');
		this.defaultFilter = 'x_loaner_isloaner=true^EQ';
		this.moduleTable   = 'sys_app_module';
		this.modList       = [];
		this.displayOutput = displayOutput;
	},
		
	/*
 	* insertModule - create a new module based on the sy
 	*
 	* @param - none
 	* @return - sys_id of the module
 	*
 	*/
	insertModule : function() {
		
		var newMod = new GlideRecord(this.moduleTable);
		
		newMod.newRecord();
		newMod.title       = this.modName + 's';
		newMod.name        = this.modTable;
		newMod.application = this.appID;
		newMod.inactive    = false;
		newMod.filter      = this.defaultFilter;
		newMod.view_name   = 'Loaner';
		newMod.order       = this._nextModuleOrder();
		var id = newMod.insert();
		if (this.displayOutput) {
			var msg = gs.getMessage('loaner_module_inserted', [newMod.title]);
			gs.addInfoMessage(msg);
		}
		
		return id;
	},
	
	/*
 	* updateModules - look for any existing modules and update the table, name, and active
 	*
 	* @param oldMod - previous choicelist info (to find old module)
 	* @return - N/A
 	*
 	*/
	updateModules : function(oldMod) {
		
		var mod = new GlideRecord(this.moduleTable);
		mod.addQuery('title', 'STARTSWITH', oldMod.label);
		mod.addQuery('name', oldMod.value);
		mod.query();
		gs.debug(mod.getRowCount() + ' records found. title=' + oldMod.label + ' name=' + oldMod.value);
		
		while (mod.next()) {
			gs.debug('old active=' + mod.active + ' new active=' + !this.choiceRec.inactive);
			gs.debug('title=' + this.modName + ' name=' + this.modTable);
			mod.title       = this.modName;
			mod.name        = this.modTable;
			mod.active      = !this.choiceRec.inactive;
		
			mod.update();
			
			gs.debug('filter=' + mod.filter + ' name=' + mod.name);
			if (this.displayOutput) {
				var msg = gs.getMessage('loaner_module_updated', [mod.title]);
				gs.addInfoMessage(msg);
			}
		}
		
		return;
	},
	
	/*
 	* moduleExists - check if at least one module exists for the given table/name
 	*
	* @param - none
 	* @return boolean - true if at least module exists for this combination
 	*
 	*/
	moduleExists : function() {
		
		var count = 0;
		var mod = new GlideAggregate(this.moduleTable);
		
		mod.addQuery('title', 'STARTSWITH', this.modName);
		mod.addQuery('name', this.modTable);
		mod.addQuery('application', this.appID);
		mod.addAggregate('COUNT');
		mod.query();
		
		if (mod.next()) {
			count = mod.getAggregate('COUNT');
		}
		
		return count > 0;
	},
	
	/*
 	* setLoanerModulesActive - activate all modules for the given table/name
 	*
 	* @param active - boolean to enable/disable module
 	* @return
 	*
 	*/
	setModulesActive : function(active) {
		
		var mod = new GlideRecord(this.moduleTable);
		
		mod.addQuery('title', 'STARTSWITH', this.modName);
		mod.addQuery('name', this.modTable);
		mod.addQuery('application', this.appID);
		mod.query();
		gs.debug(mod.getRowCount() + ' records found');
		
		while (mod.next()) {
			gs.debug('active=' + active + ' mod.active=' + mod.active);
			if (active != mod.active) {
				gs.debug('updated');
				mod.active = active;
				mod.update();
				
				if (this.displayOutput) {
					var msg = gs.getMessage(active ? 'loaner_module_activated' : 'loaner_module_deactivated', [this.modName]);
					gs.addInfoMessage(msg);
				}
			}
		}
	},
	
	/*
 	* _nextModuleOlder - find the next module # in increments of 100
 	*
 	* @param - none
 	* @return integer - module order number
 	*
 	*/
	_nextModuleOrder : function() {
		
		var mod = new GlideRecord(this.moduleTable);
		var retVal = 2200;
		var max = -1;
		
		mod.addQuery('application', this.appID);
		mod.addQuery('order', '>', 2000);
		mod.addQuery('order', '<', 3000);
		mod.query();
		
		while (mod.next()) {
			var o = parseInt(mod.getValue('order'));
			if (o > max)
				max = o;
		}
		
		// Now calculate the next number
		if ((max % 100) != 0) {
			retVal = (max - (max % 100)) + 100;
			
		} else {
			retVal = max + 100;
		}
		
		return retVal;
		
	},
	
	type: 'LoanerSetup'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-08-03 22:43:50</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>e9ec2f0567012200bb2c5bb557415a0a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>37</sys_mod_count><sys_name>LoanerSetup</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Loaner Request" source="x_loaner">24e4b01167301200f5c55bb557415a68</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Request">24e4b01167301200f5c55bb557415a68</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_e9ec2f0567012200bb2c5bb557415a0a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin_SHARE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-08-04 19:51:26</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_message_645ad86067012200bb2c5bb557415ad7
sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_message"><sys_ui_message action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><application/><key>loaner_request_form_main_section_header</key><language>en</language><message>The loaner request form is used to manage a request for a resource at a given location (e.g. a laptop from New York) for a given period of time. The process flow at the top describes the linear process to reserve, prepare, use, and return a resource. When a CI is defined in the Request state, the form automatically advances to Reserved state.</message><sys_class_name>sys_ui_message</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-08-01 18:06:37</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>645ad86067012200bb2c5bb557415ad7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>loaner_request_form_main_section_header</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Loaner Request" source="x_loaner">24e4b01167301200f5c55bb557415a68</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Request">24e4b01167301200f5c55bb557415a68</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_message_645ad86067012200bb2c5bb557415ad7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin_SHARE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-08-01 18:06:37</sys_updated_on></sys_ui_message></record_update>
